oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pocket Bible with tintype of wounded New York soldier J. E. McCombs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pocket Bible presented to J. E. McCombs by the New York Bible Society at the city hospital of New York on July 28, 1862. Tin type photo of soldier affixed to front cover. Front and back cover contain biographical information. McCombs Co. G, 14th Regt. N. Y. Vols., was wounded at battle outside Richmond, Virginia during the Peninsular campaign and went to New York to recover. Bible presented "To the Defenders of Their Country" by the NY Bible Society.
